title: Jan 10 - Quest System Online
entries: [0001] 20:14 | Quest loader confirmed operational (index → 5 quest files).
[0004] 20:33 | Added objective persistence via localStorage (progress survives refresh).
[0005] 20:44 | Implemented auto-complete: status flips to COMPLETED when all objectives checked.
[0006] 20:53 | Debugged missing helpers (loadObjectiveState/saveObjectiveState) and stabilized render pipeline.
[0007] 20:58 | Verified final UX: quests load, check-off works, auto-complete works, persistence works.
